interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Gio Naturals Organic Moroccan Argan Oil, 4 oz - 100% Pure and USDA Certified for Face, Hair, Skin and Nails Review Date: 2015/10/12 Average Rating: 3.6 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6 x 2.2 x 2.1 inches; 8.16 Ounces', 'UPC': '820103119702'} Review Text: This is 100% pure organic argan oil. Nothing added. Excellent quality and effective on our hair and nails. Most of the other brands that claim to be 100% pure argan oil actually add fragrance and preservatives. If you're using this on your face or hair, those extras can cause irritation and clogged pores. My wife and I especially like this pump top dispenser. You can precisely control how much you use. The greatest part,though, has to be the rock bottom price. We've seen this stuff top $20 per ounce. Here you get 4 ounces of cold pressed organic argan oil for 16 bucks. Recommend
<discount provided for evaluation and review Review Title: Naturally powerful Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Product Preference**: Strong inclination towards organic and natural personal care products, particularly oils known for their versatility in use (face, hair, skin, nails).
- **Quality Conscious**: Values 100% pure products without additives like fragrances or preservatives, indicating a preference for authenticity and purity.
- **Pricing Sensitivity**: Looks for high value at a reasonable price point, appreciates cost-effective options that offer quality.
- **Convenience Features**: Favors products with user-friendly designs, such as a pump dispenser for controlled application, highlighting a trend towards convenience in usage.
- **Positive Feedback**: Responds well to effective performance and notable quality, as indicated by a high rating when satisfied.

Overall, the user seeks effective, high-quality organic products that deliver value for money while prioritizing purity and ease of use.
